function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Identification of risk areas in the city related to contagion propagation.","Impact":"Potential increase in the probability of contagion due to crowded areas and vulnerable groups.","Mitigation":"Implementation of a safe pedestrian navigation service to enable people to avoid risk areas through alternative routes.","Technologies":"Development of a safe pedestrian navigation service, integration of rule-based system like CLIPS, and common-sense knowledge base like Scone.","People":"Citizens, particularly in crowded areas and near vulnerable groups such as nursing homes.","Owner":"City authorities, urban planners, technology developers."},{"Description":"Inability of the danger model to accurately capture the usual functioning of the city and the routines of its citizens.","Impact":"Ineffective identification and representation of risk in different areas of the city, leading to faulty risk assessment.","Mitigation":"Thorough data collection and analysis to ensure the model reflects the actual patterns of movement and activities in the city.","Technologies":"Utilization of accurate and up-to-date data collection techniques, integration of advanced machine learning algorithms for pattern recognition.","People":"City authorities, urban planners, data analysts.","Owner":"City authorities, urban planners, data analysis teams."}]}
